name: Great King Rat
content: Great king rat died today
Born on the twenty first of may
Every second word he swore
Yes he was the son of a whore
Always wanted by the law
Wouldn't you like to know
Wouldn't you like to know
Wouldn't you like to know
Great king rat was a dirty old man
And a dirty old man was he
What did I tell you
Would you like to see
Where will I be tomorrow
Will I beg or will I borrow
I don't care anyway
Come on come on the time is right
The man is evil and that is right
I told you ah yes I told you
And that's no lie
Wouldn't you like to know
Wouldn't you like to know people
Great king rat was a dirty old man
And a dirty old man was he
What did I tell you
Would you like to see
People who
Wouldn't you like to know
Wouldn't you like to know people
Great king rat was a dirty old man
And a dirty old man was he
Now what did I tell you
Would you like to see
Now listen all you people
Put out the good and keep the bad
You sinners get in line
Saints you leave far behind
Don't listen to what mama says
Not a word not a word mama says
The great lord before he died
Knelt sinners by his side
No I'm not gonna tell you
What you already know
Cause time and time again
The old man said it all a long time ago
Come come on the time is right
The man is evil and that is right
I told you told you once before
That's no lie
Wouldn't you like to know
Wouldn't you like to know people
Great king rat was a dirty old man
And a dirty old man was he
The last time I tell you
Would you like to see
